doc.title: American Lottery
doc.plot: Liquor store night clerk Jose has two dreams: Winning the State Lottery and winning the heart of a lovely young shoe store salesperson, Diana. The first one comes easier than he expects. Before his very eyes on the store TV monitor, he sees his pick come up as the winning numbers for $50-million! It is the weekend and the lottery office is closed. He has no car. He confides in his best friend, Singh. A close acquaintance overhears their conversation, and, when promised a fee, reports the win to Cindy Capone, smooth-talking, deadly leader of a hoodlum gang, who sends her paramour, Max, to get his hands on the winning ticket. But Jose has hidden it in a shoe. Max and his men torture Jose and threaten to kill but fails to get the ticket so Cindy has to take care of business herself. Diana, who secretly returns Jose's affection, comes to his rescue, but is taken hostage. However, love conquers all and...
